name: Zucchini Bread with Truvia® Baking Blend
author: Truvia(R)
summary: This recipe makes two moist and delicious loaves that are easy to make and freeze. Made with Truvia® Baking Blend, this zucchini bread version contains 70% less sugar than the full-sugar version.
ingredients: 2 cups coarsely grated zucchini, loosely packed
directions: Spray two 8 x 4 bread pans with non-stick cooking spray
In a large bowl, beat eggs until frothy
Gradually add Truvia® Baking Blend, oil, and vanilla
Beat until thick and yellow colored
In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, cinnamon, baking soda, baking powder, and salt
Stir dry mixture into the wet mixture
Pour batter into pans and level
Bake for 1 hour or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean
Cool for 10 minutes and remove to a wire rack to complete cooling
